hours_text:
## **Find Us**

The Museum is located at 812 E. Lincoln Rd, on the South Highway 70/259 Bypass, in Idabel, Oklahoma. **[Admission is free thanks to the generous support of our Corporate Partners](https://www.museumoftheredriver.org/support/).**

## 

Tuesday – Saturday: 10 am to 5 pm   
Sunday: 10 am to 3 pm  
CLOSED: Mondays and National Holidays 

## **Contact Us**

(580) 286 – 3616   
pr@motrr.org

collections_text:
# Open Regularly Scheduled Hours Tues-Sat 10am-5pm Sun 10am-3pm

# [Map (click](https://www.google.com/maps/place/812+E+Lincoln+Rd,+Idabel,+OK+74745/@33.8803904,-94.8222576,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x863571fd4357e27b:0x42e1cba1ba5772e8!8m2!3d33.880386!4d-94.8200689) here)

The Museum of the Red River is home to art and archaeology from around the world and the Oklahoma State Dinosaur, [_Acrocanthosaurus atokensis_](https://museumoftheredriver.org/acro/). Admission is always free thanks to our corporate partners.

## [2025 Festival of Trees Winners](https://museumoftheredriver.org/2025-festival-of-trees-winners/)
